name: Pocket Adventure: Idle Master
description: Possess nearly two hundred monsters to be unlocked and collected. Powerful equipment system, multi-line and multi-professional monsters, free collocation of talented gems, and high degree of freedom to form your strongest lineup! Compete on the same stage in the arena; peak duel in the guild war; compete for the strongest across the server ladder, and there are many gameplays waiting to be experienced one by one. The monster is with you all the way!
